CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Kartoon Studios, Inc., formerly Genius Brands International, Inc., is a global media company developing, producing, marketing and licensing branded animated entertainment properties and consumer products for media and retail distribution. Its IP portfolio of family-friendly content features the Stan Lee brand, Stan Lee's Superhero Kindergarten, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, on Kartoon Channel!; Shaq's Garage, starring Shaquille O'Neal, coming to Kartoon Channel!; Rainbow Rangers on Kartoon Channel! and Netflix; Llama Llama, starring Jennifer Garner, on Netflix and more. Its Toon Media Networks is a distributed entertainment platform, which consists of Kartoon Channel!, Frederator Network and Ameba. Kartoon Channel! is a distributed entertainment platform. Frederator Network owns and operates the animation network on YouTube, with channels having over 2000 creators and influencers. Ameba is a children's video streaming service that has active, engaging and intelligent programming.
